website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Baseline Low is a good quality basketball sneaker considering its very affordable price. Perfect for any activity, these low-top basketball shoes feature a combination of synthetic leathers and mesh for lightweight support and durability. Wearers are also pleased with the comfort and support the Phylon foam and encapsulated Air-sole unit provide. Overall, these Nike basketball sneakers offer great value and have you covered in your daily grind.
pros: According to most purchasers, the Nike Air Baseline Low is a really excellent basketball shoe for its price
These Nike basketball shoes are very durable and ideal for outdoor hoops, a good number of players comment
Several wearers love the step-in comfort of the Air Baseline Low
Some purchasers appreciate the quality of these cheap basketball shoes from Nike
According to them, the Air Baseline Low is well made and has excellent materials
A lot of owners are happy with the shoe's classic look
These low-tops are surprisingly very supportive, a good number of hoopers comment
Many reviewers are saying that the Nike Air Baseline Low fits great
Like the LeBron Witness 4, several users are claiming that these basketball shoes feel light on-feet
cons: According to several buyers, these Nike basketball shoes feel narrow
Owner of the Nike KD 12 have a similar gripe
The Air Baseline Low lacks cushioning, some players complain
These basketball shoes require some time to break-in, a good number of owners gripe
The Nike Air Baseline Low doesn't have enough arch support, a few wearers observe

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow in the tip, soles are thin, but for the price a really good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for a few months now, now that they are broken in they are better. I ended up a full size larger than I usually wear because the toe areas are too narrow my pinky toe would feel squished by the end of the day and some blister on the top of my toe. But now that the shoe is broken in it's ok. I'd recomend at least a 1/2 size above what you usually wear. The soles are thin but have held up well. The overall look of the shoe is great and it cleans really easily.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: The Nike swoosh on the side of the shoes is not sealed properly and constantly gets moisture inside. Besides that a good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoops anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of these shoes before so I knew what to expect. However, they sqeek more than I noticed before. To the point were I really dont like to wear them. Not the first shoe I pick to wear and not very comfortable either.
customer_reviews.author: dequatte bridges

customer_reviews.title: Colin Kaepernick
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for solidarity with Colin. The fit is fine and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jobrumo

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: The price was great for this shoe, it's hard to get a reasonable priced basketball sneaker for less than $60 nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Lummus

customer_reviews.title: Give them time
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were too tight at first, I thought I made a mistake. Kept wearing and they're broken in now, so comfortable. And a great price!
customer_reviews.author: E S

customer_reviews.title: Size is far too small
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be very well made and are probably a great product. However the size was WAY too small.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Andriot

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of wide Nike shoes I've bought. Also these are beyond the best pair I've ever owned. (Roughly bought 50 pairs thru out the years) These are my everyday use for work; great material, very comfortable, very supported. I absolutely would buy another pair in a heartbeat. Great Job Nike these are amazing shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Thurman

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My pops loves these shoes and they fit perfectly! Exactly what he needed
customer_reviews.author: Zaida

customer_reviews.title: Hot Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. Had to wear band-aids on my toes during break-in and I don't have wide feet. The breathability is terrible. My feet get extremely hot after playing sports for a prolonged period of time. Going back to Ascis once these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Billingsly

customer_reviews.title: Color is not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: As advertised but know that the sneaker is all black. Not like the picture
customer_reviews.author: slackmani

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a basic kinda of guy. It's hard to find anything now a day's that doesn't have flashy colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pair of shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits tighter than expected, should have gotten a half size larger, but it is a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: memphisman

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Looked a little different then I’d imagined but not terrible
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Tis good
customer_reviews.text: The ones i ordered were to small. I returned them and am reordering the exact same shoes, but size 13. Point being is, if these shoes sucked, i wouldn't have reordered the same ones.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged. And paper left dusty residue on shoe....I was able to dust off. But was hard to wrap. They were a gift for my son. He loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Where these all the time to the gym or basketball court, they are fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Excately as expected on time perfect fit ecsllent shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: Men's Nike sneakr Was ordered . arrived within 2 days on time Was excately as picture showed a perfect fit was a overall good shopping experience
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sainato

customer_reviews.title: Left is good, right is squeezing longitudinally esp posteriorly
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but still blistering achelles tendon of my right foot
customer_reviews.author: Ieita Atanrerei

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great color was not what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great would be great if they were correct color

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair
customer_reviews.text: Too small so order a size up. The shoes were new and good quality but covered in cat hair.

customer_reviews.title: Really great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks better in person in the picture. I get a ton of compliments and people asking where I got them.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe yet. Able to take out of the box and start playing on the court with no break in tune needed at all.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy shoes online unless you are completely sure about the fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes seemed worn and cleaned (possible return). Slight crease across the left toe. Very snug fit.

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker for the price

customer_reviews.title: Don't go by the picture shown. This 2nd time I was sent wrong colored shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering black sneakers because the picture shown was fir black sneakers.

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd pair cause they fit that good
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable you can walk miles and feel light on your feet

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Get em a half a size bigger than toy need cause they fit tight

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked great but I ordered an 11 1/2 and got one in that size and one in a 10 1/2

customer_reviews.title: Very good pair of shoes and a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved the shoes Fit really good and came on time!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect , great looking shoe . grips the floor well

customer_reviews.title: Not at all comfortable; each shoe fits differently
customer_reviews.text: Not at all comfortable; each shoe fits differently. Also the swoosh gets moisture in it easily. One of worst Nike products I've ever owned.

customer_reviews.title: dope black shoes
customer_reviews.text: cool shoes, fit a little tight on the right foot, but it's probably just me.

customer_reviews.title: The price!!
customer_reviews.text: Price was great, fit perfect & all white sneaker my husband loves!!

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel of the product
customer_reviews.text: The look of the shoe was very sleek and eye catching

customer_reviews.title: my sons feet are wide so nike's are good for that
customer_reviews.text: my sons feet are wide so nike's are good for that. addidas & other brands tend to run more narrow.
customer_reviews.author: norminsf

customer_reviews.title: Always looking for good looks
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes been looking for them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Erik herrera

customer_reviews.title: Iteams was just what the pic showed
customer_reviews.text: I lie the quick delivery and the perfect true to size fit
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love Amazon, so fast and the products are very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Oh to have American made again.
customer_reviews.text: I think the shoe is fine however I normally wear an 8.5 w so I ordered a 9. It arrived and proved to be too small, returned it and Kent to a 10 and it too is a little small. Somehow I think if we made the shoes here in the USA there would be better control. There are reasons we have to put up with this stuff, but that gets into the political realm and this isn't the place to air that.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Good fit. A bit pricey, but was what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Harold Lee Cassell

customer_reviews.title: A good value.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a good value and looks like the product images. The shoe runs true to it's size. The only area of concern is the stiffness of the uppers and the lack of cushion in the sole. I'm sure over time the uppers will relax and be more pliable but sole may be a different story.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, will proboly order an extra pair, very well made the FIT and COMFORT is the BEST
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Hamilton Dillon

customer_reviews.title: WAIT, I THOUGHT THEY FIT!
customer_reviews.text: WAIT, I THOUGHT THEY FIT! HE SAYS THEY DON'T. I WAS GLAD I FOUND THESE. THEY ARE JUST LIKE THE WHITE ONES HE ALREADY HAS AND (I SPOKE TOO QUICKLY ABOUT THE FIT). THE TAG ON THE SHOE SAYS THE EXACT SAME THING AS THE WHITE PAIR HE ALREADY HAS. IT SAYS "AIR BASELINE LOW" AND US12 UK11 EUR46 CM30, 12/20/13 386240-001 2/14/14, MADE IN VIETNAM 10477980 UPC 00883412076753 IS THE PRODUCT NOT LABELED CORRECTLY? WHAT SHOULD I DO?
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Takahashi iNSKIP
